verses.verse: Finally,<WG3062> my brethren,<WG80> rejoice<WG5463> in the Lord.<WG2962> To write<WG1125> the same<WG846> things<WG846> [again] is no<WG3756> trouble<WG3636> to me, and it is a safeguard<WG804> for you.
Beware<WG991> of the dogs,<WG2965> beware<WG991> of the evil<WG2556> workers,<WG2040> beware<WG991> of the false<WG2699> circumcision;<WG2699>

for we are the [true] circumcision,<WG4061> who worship<WG3000> in the Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316> and glory<WG2744> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> and put<WG3982> no<WG3756> confidence<WG3982> in the flesh,<WG4561>

although<WG2539> I myself<WG1473> might have<WG2192> confidence<WG4006> even<WG2532> in the flesh.<WG4561> If<WG1487> anyone<WG5100> else<WG243> has<WG1380> a mind<WG1380> to put<WG3982> confidence<WG3982> in the flesh,<WG4561> I far more: <WG3123>

circumcised<WG4061> the eighth<WG3637> day,<WG3637> of the nation<WG1085> of Israel,<WG2474> of the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin,<WG958> a Hebrew<WG1445> of Hebrews;<WG1445> as to the Law,<WG3551> a Pharisee;<WG5330>
as to zeal,<WG2205> a persecutor<WG1377> of the church;<WG1577> as to the righteousness<WG1343> which is in the Law,<WG3551> found<WG1096> blameless.<WG273>
But whatever<WG3748> things<WG3748> were gain<WG2771> to me, those<WG3778> things<WG3778> I have counted<WG2233> as loss<WG2209> for the sake<WG1223> of Christ.<WG5547>

More<WG3304> than<WG3304> that, I count<WG2233> all<WG3956> things<WG3956> to be loss<WG2209> in view<WG1223> of the surpassing<WG5242> value<WG5242> of knowing<WG1108> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> my Lord,<WG2962> for whom<WG3739> I have suffered<WG2210> the loss<WG2210> of all<WG3956> things,<WG3956> and count<WG2233> them but rubbish<WG4657> in order<WG2443> that I may gain<WG2770> Christ,<WG5547>

and may be found<WG2147> in Him, not having<WG2192> a righteousness<WG1343> of my own<WG1699> derived<WG1537> from [the] Law,<WG3551> but that which is through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> in Christ,<WG5547> the righteousness<WG1343> which [comes] from God<WG2316> on the basis<WG1909> of faith,<WG4102>
that I may know<WG1097> Him, and the power<WG1411> of His resurrection<WG386> and the fellowship<WG2842> of His sufferings,<WG3804> being conformed<WG4832> to His death;<WG2288>
in order<WG7055> that I may attain<WG2658> to the resurrection<WG1815> from the dead.<WG3498>

Not that I have already<WG2235> obtained<WG2983> [it], or<WG2228> have already<WG2235> become perfect,<WG5048> but I press<WG1377> on in order<WG1487> <WG2532> that I may lay<WG2638> hold<WG2638> of that for which<WG3739> also<WG2532> I was laid<WG2638> hold<WG2638> of by Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

Brethren,<WG80> I do not regard<WG3049> myself<WG1683> as having laid<WG2638> hold<WG2638> of [it] yet;<WG3768> but one<WG1520> thing<WG1520> [I do]: forgetting<WG1950> what [lies] behind<WG3694> and reaching<WG1901> forward<WG1901> to what [lies] ahead,<WG1715>
I press<WG1377> on toward<WG1519> the goal<WG4649> for the prize<WG1017> of the upward<WG507> call<WG2821> of God<WG2316> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

Let us therefore,<WG3767> as many<WG3745> as are perfect,<WG5046> have<WG5426> this<WG3778> attitude;<WG5426> and if<WG1487> in anything<WG5100> you have<WG5426> a different<WG2088> attitude,<WG5426> God<WG2316> will reveal<WG601> that also<WG2532> to you;
however,<WG4133> let us keep living<WG4748> by that same<WG846> [standard] to which<WG3739> we have attained.<WG5348>
Brethren,<WG80> join<WG4831> <WG1096> in following<WG4831> my example,<WG4831> and observe<WG4648> those<WG3588> who walk<WG4043> according<WG2531> to the pattern<WG5179> you have<WG2192> in us.

For many<WG4183> walk,<WG4043> of whom<WG3739> I often<WG4178> told<WG3004> you, and now<WG3568> tell<WG3004> you even<WG2532> weeping,<WG2799> [that they are] enemies<WG2190> of the cross<WG4716> of Christ,<WG5547>

whose<WG3739> end<WG5056> is destruction,<WG684> whose<WG3739> god<WG2316> is [their] appetite,<WG2836> and [whose] glory<WG1391> is in their shame,<WG152> who set<WG5426> their minds<WG5426> on earthly<WG1919> things.<WG1919>
For our citizenship<WG4175> is in heaven,<WG3772> from which<WG3739> also<WG2532> we eagerly<WG553> wait<WG553> for a Savior,<WG4990> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547>

who<WG3739> will transform<WG3345> the body<WG4983> of our humble<WG5014> state<WG5014> into conformity<WG4832> with the body<WG4983> of His glory,<WG1391> by the exertion<WG1753> of the power<WG1410> that He has<WG1410> even<WG2532> to subject<WG5293> all<WG3956> things<WG3956> to Himself.<WG846>
